article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-XsjDCy hentry entry story-col-0

header.div: HE'S LAUGHING ALL THE WAY TO THE BANK

h2.a: The Joke's On Louis

div.p: Something funny seems to have happened to Louis C. K. lately, and not in a ha-ha way. Could it be that he has found his confidence?

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-12nvfVI hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: The Story Of A Failed Startup And A Founder Driven To Suicide

div.p: News of Jody Sherman's suicide ripped through Twitter and the technology blogs. His death left thousands aching and confused. He left no note.

header.div: FOR INVESTORS WHO CAN'T READ GOOD

h2.a: Super Mario Bros. Explains Bitcoin In A One-Minute Video

div.p: We made a video explaining how Bitcoin works through classic Super Mario Bros clips.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-Z6ZfCr hentry entry story-col-0

header.div: AFRAID OF BEING LIKE RODNEY DANGERFIELD

h2.a: Why Dictators Don’t Like Jokes

div.p: Pro-democracy activists around the world are discovering that humor is one of the most powerful weapons in the fight against authoritarianism.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-10EFxOg hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Taser Wants To Turn Cops Into Surveillance Cameras

div.p: The stun-gun company wants 'COPS' on steroids, but whom does it serve?

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-XXF4uJ hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Scientology: The Story

span.a: The New York Review of Books

div.p: Not to be read home alone on a stormy night: "Going Clear," is a scary book about Scientology and its influence, with its accounts of vindictive lawyers and apostate captives confined in the “Hole,” a building that held dozens of people at a time.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-Y2Zu0Y hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Twitter Just Became A Games Platform

div.p: Twitter just became a distribution platform for mobile apps but what’s even more interesting are the new possibilities this creates for mobile game developers.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-ZcRtg0 hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Has A Seattle Building Discovered The Secret To Making Stairs Irresistible?

div.p: Seattle’s $30 million carbon neutral Bullitt Center, billed as the world’s greenest commercial building, will feature what its owner, the Bullitt Foundation, calls an “irresistible stairway” when it opens at the end of the month.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YzhmUY hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Inside Time Warner Cable's Campaign To Silence A Parody Video

div.p: If you think Time Warner Cable’s customer service is bad, wait to you see how the far the company will go to shut down an online parody campaign.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-Zc6uYR hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: So Russia Has An Upgraded Flamethrower Tank Now

div.p: Everything about this is awesome.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-12nBNr6 hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Good Guy With A Gun? This Game Plays Out The Consequences

div.p: The Best Amendment is a pay-what-you-like Mac/Win/Flash game that plays out NRA president Wayne LaPierre's infamous statement that "The only thing that stops a bad guy with a gun is a good guy with a gun."

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-XYeP7l hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Dogs Wearing Pantyhose

div.p: People seem to have a love-hate relationship with dogs dressed up like humans, but that hasn't stopped the Internet from churning out more ridiculous memes.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-12pdJ3o hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: 7 Iconic Film Props You Can Totally Try to Buy Right Now

div.p: Break out your checkbook and get ready to explain to your kids why they're not going to college anymore, Julien's Auction House is currently running its "Hollywood Legends 2013" live auction in Beverly Hills.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-10yitSZ hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Xbox Players Better In Bed Than Playstation And Wii Rivals

div.p: A study by a money saving website has revealed that Xbox 360 owners are the best in the bedroom.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-10ESpUR hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: The Rise And Fall Of A Velour Empire

div.p: How does one sell a tracksuit empire without a time machine? Fifth & Pacific, formerly known as Liz Claiborne, is trying to find out. It has put on the block its Juicy Couture brand, as well as its Lucky denim line.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-12nWxyQ hentry entry story-col-0

header.div: TOOK IT A BIT TOO FAR

h2.a: Filmmaker Freezes To Death While Making A Documentary On Homelessness

div.p: A young filmmaker is believed to have frozen to death as he made a documentary about sleeping rough on the streets.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-Z6P2Wr hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Watch Raspberries Shattering In Slow Motion

div.p: It's pretty self-explanatory.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-10ySNXg hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Who Is Apple’s ‘John Appleseed’?

div.p: In its ads, keynote presentations and video tutorials, Apple has been using a person named ‘John Appleseed’ to demo its iPhones and other devices. But who is John Appleseed?

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-Y2cmEw hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: The U.S. Military's North Korea Back-Up Plan

div.p: Courageous Channel isn’t some new offering from your cable TV provider. It’s how the U.S. military plans on getting thousands of U.S. civilians out of South Korea in a hurry if it looks like war with North Korea is imminent.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-XhXjcC hentry entry story-col-1

header.div: SIM CITY WOULD HAVE BEEN TOO META

h2.a: Philadelphia Building Acts As Pong Screen

div.p: So, you think that you are pretty fly with your new 80” HDTV? Just before you go bragging that you have the largest gaming display in your neighborhood, you might want to swallow that pride and check out the Cira Center in Philadelphia.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-11wFCHO hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Why Dudes Who Can't Smell Never Get Laid

div.p: One of the unexpected parts of not having a sense of smell.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-10AsaQE hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Jon Stewart Tears Apart CNN

div.p: Jon Stewart took a break from politics to dish out a little media criticism tonight aimed squarely at CNN.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-12o4AvC hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: What China's Online Censorship Systems Block

div.p: Though official data on the operation of China's two state-run online censorship systems, the Great Firewall and Golden Shield, are unavailable for obvious reasons, various studies have been conducted to infer how many people are hitting the delete keys.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-16smEmT hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Cougar Night In Silicon Valley

div.p: Thursday nights have become surprisingly popular at a five-star Menlo Park hotel. Two eagle-eyed matchmakers, big tech money, and an army of stiletto-shod women mix and mingle there—all important factors in Silicon Valley’s peculiar mating algorithm.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-XWbq9f hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: North Korea Sure Is Acting Like It Wants To Start A War

div.p: The situation on the Korean peninsula is not getting any better today, as the North continues to posture as though it's ready to start a war.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-10CBEtj hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: The Warhammer Workshop

div.p: Building an army, one handcrafted figurine at a time.

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YA8sGM hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Why Did Old-Time Announcers Talk That Way?

div.p: You know it when you hear it. It's that strange, clipped and carefully enunciated style of speech associated with mid-century newsreels and sportscasters. But why did they talk like that?

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-17giMqy hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Gibsonton: Where Carnies Go To Get Away From Civilians

div.p: Gibsonton has long been a winter home to all the freak-show acts and show people. At one time, Gibsonton had one of the only post offices in America that had shortened countertops for little people.

h2.a: 9 FIFA Glitches That Will Terrify, Arouse And Amuse You

div.p: FIFA is the best sports game on the market. It's also the scariest, funniest, and kinkiest.

h2.a: This Is Where The World’s Richest People Hide Their Money

div.p: A massive leak of offshore accounts shows just how much money billionaires try to hide in offshore accounts. Here are some of the biggest culprits.
